channel.title: Adding custom!317! ITEMDEF
channel.description: Can someone help me to figure out how to add a custom...With a raw files not a models files...and with itemdef not class8 example can some explain me how to add a death capes..ty

item.title: Adding custom!317! ITEMDEF
item.dc:creator: @soulfear1234 soulfear1234
item.description:
@soulfear1234 wrote:

Look man i try to add the tokhaar-kal this is the ints…

case 15004:
itemDef.name =“TokHaar-Kal”;
itemDef.anInt204 = 0;
itemDef.value = 60000;
itemDef.maleEquip1 = 62575;
itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 62582;
itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
itemDef.groundActions[2] = “Take”;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = -4;
itemDef.modelID = 62592;
itemDef.stackable = false;
itemDef.description = “A cape made of ancient, enchanted obsidian.”.getBytes();
itemDef.modelZoom = 2086;
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.actions[4] = “Drop”;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0;
itemDef.modelRotation1 = 533;
itemDef.modelRotation2 = 333;
break;
and i add the 3 model : 62575,62592,62582 to my raw folders and to my data files into my cache in C:/

and when i compile everything work…exexpte when i spawning the cape my client freez… and i get an error : [img=http://s28.postimg.org/iqcz9j9jt/error2.jpg]http://

Please help me!! :palm

Read full topic

item.title: Adding custom!317! ITEMDEF
item.dc:creator: @chaosplaya09 chaosplaya09
item.description:
@chaosplaya09 wrote:

i can teach you how to add dclaws not the spec though.

   case 14484:
            itemDef.actions = new String[5];
            itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield";
            itemDef.modelID = 44590;
            itemDef.maleEquip1 = 43660;//anInt165
            itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 43660;//anInt200
            itemDef.modelZoom = 789;
            itemDef.modelRotation1 = 240;
            itemDef.modelRotation2 = 60;
            itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1;
            itemDef.modelOffset2 = -23;
            itemDef.name = "Dragon claws";
            itemDef.description = "A set of fighting claws.".getBytes();

under the break; of case 11722:

save

then download the right dclaws models and add them into the cache/data

Read full topic
